dct_description_sm: drawn from the most approved geographers with great improvements from the Sieurs D'Anville & Robert.
"Robert" in the statement of authorship is probably Gilles Robert de Vaugondy.
Imprint: London : Printed from Robt. Sayer ..., [1764?].
Two sheet mounted together as one.
Includes arrows indicating prevailing wind directions
Includes table of the divisions of Africa.
Shows the east coast of Brazil and islands of the Indian Ocean as far east as the Maldives
Forms part of the Roger S. Baskes Collection at the Newberry Library. ICN
